nodes.text: I've given him more than enough gifts for today.
Would you like some nice wine? It may remind you of your youth. You know, when you were alive...
Didn't think so. Guess that was so long ago, you can't remember what wine is for.
I have a bottle of the finest wine this castle ever made. Would you like it?
Eh, you don't know what you are missing!
I brought you a Magical Healing Potion. Maybe it will heal some of those aches and pains of body parts falling off...
No? Well, you may be sorry later when you are missing a finger or two. It makes it hard to turn pages.
I thought you might like to have this very creepy book. It reminds me of you.
Yessssss.
Huh. I guess this spooky book really is your sort of thing.
I thought you might like to have a rose. You know, you could use something fresh around here.
Here, a sweet rose for someone sweet.
I brought you a new rose to add to your collection.
Here's a rose for your rosy complexion.
Would you like another rose to mask the smell of decay in here?
<nod>
What do you know? He likes it!
It's so good to see a smile on your face!
Hi there, I'm Shawn. Shawn O'Conner.
So how are you today? Chipper as always?
Hi again. Miss me much?
Lovely day today, isn't it? Nothing quite like the brisk smell of decay...
Good to see you so full of good spirits, sir.

Pretty fancy place you have here. I take it you've been here a while... Do you ever go out, have a night on the town, or are you more of a "stay in your chair and read" for the rest of your afterlife sort of guy?
It's probably a good thing you don't go out on the town... Most townspeople might not quite "get" your whole life after death vibe.
That painting... I take it that she was someone you cared about... She's very beautiful. I'll bet she was a nice person, too.
Um... that stuff in the fancy magical container... It's not harmful, is it? I mean, it isn't what made you look like you do, does it?
It's just that I'm not quite ready for the whole "Undead and Loving it" scene.
See you later!
Have fun and don't do anything I wouldn't do.
Good night and sweet dreams.
Don't let the dungeons get you down.
Nighty-night, Mr. Creepy Guy. Try not to cause too many nightmares.
